colorwheel.alert.incompatible_pack: The shader pack %1$s is not compatible
colorwheel.alert.incompatible_pack.patch: You should select %1$s in the Shader Packs menu instead
colorwheel.alert.incompatible_pack.ask_f: You may request Colorwheel support to the shader pack developer. You may also enable the %1$s for fully automatic support. There WILL BE graphical issues and extensive support WON'T be provided.
colorwheel.alert.broken_pack: Current shader pack contains broken shaders, expect graphical issues
command.colorwheel.alert_incompatible_pa: Incompatible shader pack alert is enabled
Incompatible shader pack alert is disabled
Incompatible shader pack alert is now enabled
Incompatible shader pack alert is now disabled
command.colorwheel.alert_broken_pack.get: Broken shader pack alert is enabled
Broken shader pack alert is disabled
command.colorwheel.alert_broken_pack.set: Broken shader pack alert is now enabled
Broken shader pack alert is now disabled
command.colorwheel.fallback_mode.set.on: Fallback mode is now enabled. Here be dragons !
